channel.title: Best Source?
channel.description:
Im trying to find a source that is a good starting point to make my own server from. I've tried lots of sources, but so far, all of them have had one or more flaws that i could get around.
Here is what im looking for: -NOT a PK server. PKing only above the normal wilderness line. -Working Skills - such as woodcutting, fishing, smithing, etc. Especially woodcutting and smithing...i want those. -Training on monsters and on dummies/haystacks/doors or wutever. -Barrows prefferably :D
Does a server like this even exist? If so... Please tell me! Most of the other servers i have tried are over-modified or dont have anything like that in the first place....

item.title: Best Source?
item.dc:creator: @m0ng00se m0ng00se
item.description:
@m0ng00se wrote:

Phonescape. Okay,much thanks. Will go download now

Read full topic

item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

d4rk n0v4:

whitescape : -just make handlers for the skils

It doesn’t sound like he’s able to make handlers for them O.o
He could just try making cases for them or just upgrading the cases if they are already in there.

item.title: Best Source?
item.dc:creator: @m0ng00se m0ng00se
item.description:
@m0ng00se wrote:

Well, the problem is, some of the sources i have tried to use have woodcutting already added, but it doesnt work… And i cant just over-write it… So, yah. RealisticScape is really nice, i think i might use that one, except the comiler wont work, so i cant make any updates…Rawr. Always a problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Source?
item.dc:creator: @Kitno Kitno
item.description:
@Kitno wrote:

Get p16 v1 and do a lot of work on it. The best server is in your opinion so edit one until it fits your definition of the “best”.

Read full topic
